channel.title: Blogs on Olivia Weng
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Olivia Weng

item.title: On taking walks after lunch
item.description: Dear reader, Taking walks after lunch, mostly alone but occasionally with friends, has been one of the best decisions I've made in college. I used to approach college with a keep-your-foot-on-the-gas-for-the-love-of-all-that-is-good mentality. Not working was bad and a waste of time. Then the unsustainability of it all hit me around my third year. It was only halfway through the year, and I woke up every day feeling burned out, worn out.
